thread.section_title: PromGirl Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PromGirl | www.promgirl.com | 20 of 539
thread.title: Lauren

author: Lauren
title: Lauren
text: Ordered a dress for a wedding I have to attend in March. I tried it on and its looks great! Seems like a good dress for the price. Only think I am a little hesitant about when ordering from here is the return policy. You only have 10 days to return i if you don't want it. While I understand why that might be necessary, it's not much time to think if you are getting a few options (and are maybe a bit indecisive). Still happy with my experience though :)
